Public Remarks: Located in the charming and prestigious South Granville/Kerrisdale area, this bright and breathtaking modern home will please the most sophisticated buyer. This is a warm home with tastefully appointed interior design: from its spacious front entrance to its modern kitchen and its luxurious finish, this remarkable and contemporary home on a tree-lined street will appeal to refined buyers looking for a comfortable home in a safe and desirable environment. Excellent public and private schools located nearby - Magee Secondary and Maple Grove Elementary; Crofton House, York House; Vancouver College and St. George's. Two minutes away from great shopping on Kerrisdale High Street on 41st and Bvld, 10 minutes to downtown or airport.

Public Remarks: This elegant residence is situated in Chartwell. It boasts breathtaking city and harbour views of downtown, Lions Gate Bridge, Stanley Park & UBC. This gorgeous view could be enjoyed while louging on the terrace, swimming pool & Jacuzzi. Greeted by magnificent entrance hallway, Ionic columns, Italian marble & impressive Strass crystal chandelier. Features include gated entrance, stunning open plan, high ceilings, 4 ensuited bedrooms, rec room, huge balcony & private terraces. Sentinel Secondary School and Chartwell Elementary School are in a walkable distance. BC assessment for 2016 is $5,935,000.00
Realtor Remarks: One of the owners is a licensed real estate agent. Text Alisha for showing.

Public Remarks: Panoramic Water, City & Mountain view from all 3 levels situated high atop West 8th, one of the most desirable streets in Pt. Grey. Walk across the street to Pt. Grey Academy. Top of the line everything! Designed by famous architect Jim Bussey, Formwerks- renovated in 2014. 6 bedrooms, 6 baths, Chef's kitchen + separate Wok kitchen, library with custom shelves, theater room, German windows & doors, appliances: Sub-Zero, Wolf, LG, A/C, radiant heat. Presidential shake TL roof with lifetime warranty, 2 addresses (4010) one for the Nanny suite, with separate entrance & kitchen. Beautiful landscaping with outdoor patio. Close to Queen Mary Elementary, Lord Byng, UBC, Jericho Beach, Spanish Banks & golf course.
Realtor Remarks: Listing agent is related to seller. Measurements are approximate and to be verified by the buyer. Buyer's agent must be present for 1st and all subsequent showings, otherwise cooperating commission will be $100. Drapes, window coverings & related hardware in upper three bedrooms are not included.

Public Remarks: PANORAMIC VIEWS OF CITY, BRIDGE & WATER. Located in the prestigious British Properties this home is situated on almost 21,000 sqft virtually flat lot. This home features iron gates, 3 car garage, large side & south facing backyard. Welcoming entrance w/ large foyer, high ceilings, spacious living room, dining room & family room w/ floor to ceiling south facing windows allowing for ample amount of natural light & spectacular panoramic views. Large kitchen w/ abundant cabinet space & a spacious pantry. Master suite ft. 2 large walk-in closets, floor to ceiling windows over looking views, 5 pc ensuite w/ jetted soaker tub & Juliet sinks. Upper level ft living room w/ wood fireplace & bar.
